Mobile Application Development

Solutions

  • A cross platform solution
  • Content can be updated over the air
  • Develop using skills that developers already have
  • Develop platforms in parallel as much as possible, speed up submission to each store.
  • Update content over the air without resubmitting to app stores.
  • SIDENOTE: Major releases still should be submitted so users are notified of updates
  • Use skill sets that are common amongst the team.
